name: Pokémon Bronze Version 2
summary:
In Pokémon Bronze 2 you start as either a boy or a girl trainer in Old Oak Town with the goal of collecting all 8 badges and then defeating the Elite Four.
But along the way, an evil team is trying to execute their plan to steal, kidnap and make money.
It even includes a full second region with post game!

Once again, going for a completely run of the mill Pokemon story game that is sorely missing from many Pokemon rom hacks.
